Roles.notes: This person leads worship. It is assumed that this person can sing.
This person is not a worship leader, but sings. They might lead a song every now and then.
This person does synth, pads, ambient, cool sounds. Kinda like how an lead EG is to rhythm EG. This person can run click track, but rhythm keyboardist can too.
This person plays the rhythm component of keys - piano, electric piano, chords, etc. Runs click track.
Plays lead electric guitar lines. Less chord strumming compared to rhythm EG. More 'solo' style stuff.
This person plays chords to rhythmically drive the band. Can play lead lines if lead EG not present, and even if lead EG is present.
This person lays down sick beats by hitting cymbals and wooden cylinders.
This person plays percussion sample pads, other non-drum set percussion instruments. Kinda like how an lead EG is to rhythm EG.
